name: Cyberfall v0.9a
description:
Cyberfall, is a game where you jump off a building, try to get the highest score, and try not to suicide!

Built and made by me (With help for the art from Blarget2), this project was made for the 10 day cyberpunk jam, made from scratched, it took about 80 Total hours to make up to this point.

While it's not perfect (I tried my best), I am open to ideas and suggestions that you want to see, and I'll keep updating this game.

I do have future plans for this, because it was a fun little project.

This game is built for PC, using monogame (XNA based platform), I've gone to extreme measures to make sure you can "download and play", but if you get an issue message me, I will do my best to help you out, I want everyone playing and enjoying my game, so if you hate it, tell me why!

Lastly, I hope you guys enjoy this game, I want nothing more than to see someone play my game and be super happy with it.
